gov.cms.qrda.schematron.merge

Class MergeInstructions

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.cms.qrda.schematron.validate.MergeProperties
      • gov.cms.qrda.schematron.merge.MergeInstructions

  • public class MergeInstructions
extends MergeProperties
    This is the class that holds all of the data required to merge a group of scheamtron templates into a single schematron file. It generates both the merged schematron file and a merge report file which is simply a text file containing logged messages generated during the merge process.
    Author:
    Dan Donahue ESAC Inc.

      • getSubnodeValues

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getSubnodeValues(org.w3c.dom.Element startNode,
                                                               java.lang.String nodeName)
        Returns a list of strings corresponding to the values of child nodes of a given name of the given start node.
        Parameters:
        startNode - The parent node element under which to start searching for the node name
        nodeName - the name of the child node under startNode to search for
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of values of each child node found

      • getSourceDirectoryFiles

        private java.util.ArrayList<SchematronTemplate> getSourceDirectoryFiles(org.w3c.dom.Element parentNode,
                                                                        java.lang.String selector)
        Given a sourceDirectory element from the directions file, return a list where each element of the list item corresponding to each subdirectory of the source directory. Each list item is a list of file names, the first of which is the schematron (.sch) located in the subdirectory, and the remaining file names are the .xml test files also in the subdirectory.
        Parameters:
        parentNode - The parent node element under which to start the search
        selector - can be one of "all" or "some", determining how to collect the child directories under the parent node
        Returns:
        An array list of SchematronTemplate objects representing the schematron subdirectories under the parent node.

      • getFilesFromDirectory

        private SchematronTemplate getFilesFromDirectory(java.lang.String fullDirPath)
        Given a directory, returns a list of filenames from that directory. The first item in the list is the schematron file (ext .sch) and the rest of the filenames in the list are the test files (.xml) from the directory.
        Parameters:
        fullDirPath - the full pathname to the directory under which the search begins
        Returns:
        a SchematronTemplate object resulting from examining the files in the given fullDirPath

      • getSchematrons

        private java.util.ArrayList<SchematronTemplate> getSchematrons(java.lang.String parentDirPath,
                                                               java.util.List<java.lang.String> exceptions,
                                                               java.lang.String selector)
        Given a pathname to a directory, return a list of items corresponding to the subdirectories under the given parent directory. Each item is itself a list of filenames found under the subdirectory. The first filename is a schematron file, the remaining are xml files.
        Parameters:
        parentDirPath - the full pathname to a directory containing subdirectories which contain schematron and test files
        exceptions - a list of subdirectory names under the the parent directory. Can either represent subdirectories to include, or those to exclude depending on the value of the selector param
        selector - a string that can be either 'all' or 'some'. 'all' implies include all subdirectories other than those listed in the exceptions list. 'some' implies include ONLY those subdirectories listed in the exceptions list
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of SchematronTemplate objects resulting from the parsing of the subdirectories as described above.

      • appendLists

        private java.util.ArrayList<SchematronTemplate> appendLists(java.util.ArrayList<SchematronTemplate> currentList,
                                                            java.util.ArrayList<SchematronTemplate> additions)
        Adds the elements of the additions list param to the currentList param
        Parameters:
        currentList - the current ArrayList of SchematronTemplate objects
        additions - the ArrayList of SchematronTemplate objects to add
        Returns:
        the new, combined ArrayList of SchematronTemplates

      • getSchematronsOnly

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getSchematronsOnly()
        Returns the filenames of the schematrons found in the list of schematron template objects
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of strings containing the schematron filenames from all of the schematron templates currently in the object's schematrons list.

      • getInstructionFiles

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getInstructionFiles(java.lang.String instructionFileListFilename)
        Static method to read a file containing a list of mergeInstruction filenames.
        Parameters:
        instructionFileListFilename - the full pathname to a file containing a list of mergeInstructions filenames, one filename per line. Note: Lines beginning with "#" are ignored.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of full pathnames for each mergeInstructions filename found in the given filename.

      • getHeaderText

        public java.lang.String getHeaderText()
        Returns a formatted string using this object's header format as a formatter, and the values of the object's title, version, fileHeader values along with the current date as data elements.
        Returns:
        a string representing the header text to insert into the merge file

      • maybeCopyVocabFile

        private void maybeCopyVocabFile(java.lang.String filename)
        Copies the file found at filename to the application's main directory with the name "voc.xml"
        Parameters:
        filename - the full pathname to the voc.xml file to copy. Note, regardless of the name of the given file, the copied version will be named "voc.xml"

      • addSchematronListToResults

        private void addSchematronListToResults()
        Add a listing of the schematron templates to the results list, The nature of the listing depends on the verbose and validation settings.

        public TestFile findExpectedErrorText(java.lang.String path)
        Opens the given file and attempts to read the expectedErrors and expectedWarnings line from the file.
        Parameters:
        path - the full pathname to the xml test file in which to search for the expectedErrors and expectedWarnings comments.
        Returns:
        a TestFile object containing information about the file (including its pathname) and expected errors and warnings.
